Name: Run, Doodleguy!
About the game: Run and jump around as Doodleguy and draw helpful platforms as the Pencil as you escape from the Big Eraser destroying the world! ...and when you're done with that, try making your own fun, or check out what other players have made! ENDLESSLY CUSTOMIZABLE Want a new challenge? Try drawing some Obstacles! Doodleguy looking a bit bald? Draw a Hat to warm his sketchy head! Wanna run faster? Tired of the Pencil? Feeling a different scroll direction? Use Game Modifiers to change up the rules! Tired of your boring old notebook? Create or download a Theme for some new scenery! ...or maybe even a new Doodleguy? ...and mix all of it together with Collections! Run through an endless forest, or create a scalable cliffside with countless permutations... anything you can draw, you can play! Run through Collections made by other players and go for the High Score! Customization lies at the very core of Run, Doodleguy! , so let your endless creativity run wild!
